plays.text: Penalty to Rob Ray 2 minutes for Hooking Jeff Halpern
Penalty to Robert Lang 2 minutes for Hooking Stu Barnes
Penalty to Chris Gratton 2 minutes for Crosschecking Steve Konowalchuk
2 minute Bench Penalty for Too Many Men on the Ice served by Jason Botterill
Penalty to Adam Mair 2 minutes for Goaltender Interference Olaf Kolzig
Goal scored by Jeff Halpern assisted by Steve Konowalchuk and Ken Klee
Penalty to Jeff Halpern 2 minutes for Hooking Taylor Pyatt
Penalty to Jaromir Jagr 2 minutes for Illegal Stick(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Steve Konowalchuk 2 minutes for Slashing Maxim Afinogenov
Penalty to Mike Grier 2 minutes for Tripping Rory Fitzpatrick
Goal scored by Ales Kotalik assisted by Miroslav Satan and Curtis Brown
Penalty to J.P. Dumont 2 minutes for Elbowing Brendan Witt
Goal scored by Jeff Halpern assisted by Sergei Gonchar and Mike Grier
Penalty to Dmitri Kalinin 2 minutes for High Sticking Mike Grier served by Marcus Ragnarsson
Penalty to Michael Nylander 2 minutes for Roughing Chris Gratton
